animeDescription: When a strange group of men attempt to kidnap Atsuko Fukune, a dancer at a club, she seeks the help of Mamiya Mugen, a famous detective - who also happens to be a child. When it turns out that other girls have gone missing, Mamiya, with the help of his butler Alucard, springs into action to solve the mystery.  (Source: ANN)
animeCharacters: ['Old Doctor', 'Fukune, Atsuko', 'Mugen, Mamiya', 'Inspector Edogawa', 'Alucard', 'Waitress', 'Japanese Captain', 'Satomi, Sakura', 'Dr. Tomino']
